Requirement: The system must allow the user to navigate to the online ordering screen.
The system must allow the user to select which physical store to order from.
The system must allow the user to select a category of food for them to order from.
The system must allow the user to cancel their order at any time.
The system must allow the user to add an item of food to their order.
The system must allow the user to check out their order when there is at least one item in their cart.
The system must allow the user to add an optional facet of an item to their order when they are ordering an item that has an optional setting.
The system must allow the user to remove an item from their order at any time.
The system must allow the user to navigate to the cart screen at any time without directing the user to another webpage.
The system must allow the user to view all available Cedar Markets on a contextual map.
The system must allow the user to input their name on the checkout screen.
The system must allow the user to input their phone number on the checkout screen.
The system must allow the user to pay for their order on the checkout screen with a credit card.
The system must allow the user to pay for their order on the checkout screen with Cash App.
The system must allow the user to see their confirmation order after paying for their food.
The system must display the user’s inputted name for the confirmation order.
The system must display the user’s inputted phone number for the confirmation order.
The system must allow a guest to make an account.
The system must allow the user to log in to a user account.
The system must allow a logged-in user to view their order history.
The system must allow a logged-in user to delete their account.
The system should allow the user to log in to an admin account.
The system must allow an admin to add an item to the website.
The system must allow an admin to adjust the price of an existing item to the website.
The system must allow an admin to adjust the inventory amount of an item.
The system must allow an admin to remove an item from the website.
The system must allow an admin to delete any user account.
The system must allow an admin to cancel any user’s order.
The system must allow an admin to notify a user with email regarding their order.
The system must allow an admin to notify a user with text regarding their order.
The system must allow the user to pay for their order on the checkout screen with their WIC benefit balance.
The system must allow the user to pay for their order on the checkout screen with their SNAP EBT card.
The system should not allow orders to be made past the closing time of the restaurant.
